excerpt: "Drugmaker Nostrum and its CEO have agreed to pay up to $50 million to settle claims for underpaying rebates owed under the Medicaid Drug Rebate Program, the Department of Justice said. The FDA expanded the indication of abatacept (Orencia) to include treatment of patients age 2 years and older with active psoriatic arthritis."
